pull.title: Improve readability of segwit.py, smartfees.py
pull.body:
More work is surely needed, but I tried to clean up some hard-to-understand helper functions.

Also fixed a logging bug in `smartfees.py` (introduced in #9768).

events.body: Force-pushed with a fix to `bumpfee.py` (forgot it was using one of the helpers I changed).

events.message: Fix logging bug and improve readability of smartfees.py

events.body:
utACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/9970/commits/1269b8a124180ea9f5d00ce282b79aeef19683c1
See also  #9983, there I converted the segwit test as well as a few others to use named arguments for RPCs everywhere.
